long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kindly aims to end cyberbullying and make students feel safer, by leveraging the latest advances in technology and empowering children to solve this pressing challenge. Kindly is a collaboration between young innovator Gitanjali Rao, who conceived the initial proof of concept, and UNICEF, which is currently leading its development as a digital public good and exploring its implementation at scale.
